Title: Fallout: New Vegas
Link: "Welcome to Vegas. New Vegas. It’s the kind of town where you dig your own grave prior to being shot in the head and left for dead…and that’s before things really get ugly. It’s a town of dreamers and desperados being torn apart by warring factions vying for complete control of this desert oasis. It’s a place where the right kind of person with the right kind of weaponry can really make a name for themselves
column9: and make more than an enemy or two along the way. As you battle your way across the heat-blasted Mojave Wasteland
column11: and the neon drenched Vegas Strip
column12: you’ll be introduced to a colorful cast of characters
column15: mutated creatures and much more. Choose sides in the upcoming war or declare “winner takes all” and crown yourself the King of New Vegas in this follow-up to the 2008 videogame of the year

Title: Civilization V
Description: "Become Ruler of the World by establishing and leading a civilization from the dawn of man into the space age: Wage war
column10: go head-to-head with some of history’s greatest leaders and build the most powerful empire the world has ever known."

Title: Night in the Woods
Description: NIGHT IN THE WOODS is an adventure game focused on exploration, story, and character, featuring dozens of characters to meet and lots to do across a lush, vibrant world.

Title: Amnesia: The Dark Descent
Description: Amnesia: The Dark Descent, a first person survival horror. A game about immersion, discovery and living through a nightmare. An experience that will chill you to the core.

Title: Alice: Madness Returns
Link: Eleven years ago a horrific fire took Alice’s family from her and left her mind horrifically scarred. Afterwards she was confined to Rutledge Asylum. After ten years she has finally secured her release. Yet she still bears the heavy psychological burden of that tragic event. With her mind in tatters she is unable to resolve the fear prompted by her strange thoughts. Perhaps she’ll do better in Wonderland. She always has.

Title: Life Is Strange
Developer: DONTNOD Entertainment, Feral Interactive (Mac) , Feral Interactive (Linux)
Publisher: Square Enix, Feral interactive (Mac), Feral Interactive (Linux)
Link: a photography senior who discovers she can rewind time while saving her best friend Chloe Price. The pair soon find themselves investigating the mysterious disappearance of fellow student Rachel Amber
column9: uncovering a dark side to life in Arcadia Bay. Meanwhile
column10: Max must quickly learn that changing the past can sometimes lead to a devastating future."

Title: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
Description: "The next chapter in the highly anticipated Elder Scrolls saga arrives from the makers of the 2006 and 2008 Games of the Year
Link: Bethesda Game Studios. Skyrim reimagines and revolutionizes the open-world fantasy epic
column9: bringing to life a complete virtual world open for you to explore any way you choose."

Title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
